title: 820-00850  (95 laptops all same problem)  Powers on but no display
message:
I have 100 of these laptops that showed up at my door.
They appear to power on and pull current and charge the battery.

No display.  
Power rails are present.
I was unable to get them into DFU.

Ideas?

title: 820-00850  (95 laptops all same problem)  Powers on but no display
message:
Did you test USB activity and external video?

Which voltages do you get on the board?
If machine turns on, all AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages should be present; so should enter to DFU.

title: 820-00850  (95 laptops all same problem)  Powers on but no display
message: we got them in DFU.   Force resetting them and rocking them out.
